title: "Kin" by Bruce McAllister
description:
A young boy contacts an alien assassin in the hopes of saving his sister’s life. "Kin" is part of Bruce McAllister's collection THE GIRL WHO LOVED ANIMALS.

Thanks to our presenting sponsor Audible. Start your free trial and get a free audiobook at audible.com/levar
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
